title: Coterie
description: An MFM Taboo RomanceThese desires that should tear us apart only draw us closer together. Blood binds, desire unites, and secrecy protects us. But what happens when the secrets become too much and the seams that hold them start to split? Our family is hanging by a thread, and at any moment it could snap. The consequences of my actions weigh heavily on my shoulders. It’s not just me who could get hurt, all three of us could suffer for my actions. The snowball is rolling and it’s gaining speed, and I’ve no way to stop it before it collides with our family. We can either adapt, endure, and survive, or be forever crushed by the avalanche.*Warning* contains mature content suitable for adults 18+, and an extremely taboo storyline. MMF/MFM/MFPreviously published in Another Family Affair Anthology
author: Ally Vance
